DOC.detailed_description: This prospective double-blind randomize placebo-controlled trial . A total 450 dyspeptic adult patient , diagnose functional dyspepsia accordance Rome III criterion , randomly allocate 1:1 proportion receive either lansoprazole 15mg placebo daily 8 week . Primary outcome complete relief dyspeptic symptom . Secondary outcome include significant symptomatic relief , improvement dyspepsia severity , health-related quality life . We use multiple logistic regression analysis investigate whether dyspepsia subgroup associate different therapeutic response .
